title: T206 Matty Dark Cap Piedmont SGC 3 for Sale...** SOLD! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: T206 Matty Dark Cap Piedmont SGC 3 for Sale...** SOLD! **
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous, vibrant color!  No wrinkling or wear....Recent comps show this card selling as high as $2100+  I'm asking $1495 delivered on mine!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=651281&d=1739570466[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=651282&d=1739570475[/IMG]

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Nice Mathewson! It looks like the name visible up top is a different player. I find this to be a cool nuance. 😀
I have a Mathewson with ‘Dunn, Baltimore’ up top. My guess is that yours is the same. Incidentally, the back centering on mine is identical to yours. I’ll add a pic of the top of mine…
Good luck with the sale !!!

Thanks Sonny, I appreciate the kind words!  Yep, you can see the "Dunn, Baltimore" on mine too...kinda funny!

I'll also drop the price to $1900 delivered.  Thanks everyone!

Brian

One more bump down to $1675....thanks all!

Brian
